mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(provider, brand_name, goods_name, goods_code, thumbnail, market_price, sell_price, adj_price, goods_info, use_note, use_term, updated) values(#{provider}, #{brand_name}, #{goods_name}, #{goods_code}, #{thumbnail}, #{market_price}, #{sell_price}, #{adj_price}, #{goods_info}, #{use_note}, #{use_term}, now());
INSERT INTO manager(id, pass, name, role_id) VALUES(HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{id}, 'hlint')), password(#{pass}), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{name}, 'hlint')), #{role_id});
mapper.select:
SELECT manager_id, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(unhex(id), 'hlint') AS CHAR(100)) as 'id', pass, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(unhex(name), 'hlint') AS CHAR(100)) as 'name', role_id FROM manager WHERE
id=HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{id}, 'hlint')) AND pass=password(#{pass})
manager_id=#{manager_id}
Limit 1

SELECT manager_id, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(unhex(id), 'hlint') AS CHAR(20)) as 'id', pass, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(unhex(name), 'hlint') AS CHAR(20)) as 'name', role_id FROM manager ORDER BY name
LIMIT #{start_index}, #{page_size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller(company_name, mid, password, code, person_name, contact, email, allowed_ip, sale_status) VALUES(#{company_name}, #{mid}, #{password}, #{code}, #{person_name}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{allowed_ip}, #{sale_status});
INSERT INTO map_seller_goods(seller_id, goods_id, commission) VALUES(#{seller_id}, #{goods_id}, #{commission});
mapper.select:
SELECT seller_id, company_name, mid, password, code, person_name, contact, email, allowed_ip, sale_status FROM seller ORDER BY company_name
LIMIT #{start_index}, #{page_size}

SELECT id, seller_id, commission, goods.goods_id, goods_name, sell_price, use_yn FROM map_seller_goods inner join goods on map_seller_goods.goods_id = goods.goods_id WHERE map_seller_goods.seller_id = #{seller_id} and map_seller_goods.use_yn=0 LIMIT #{start_index}, #{page_size}
SELECT count(*) FROM map_seller_goods WHERE seller_id = #{seller_id} and use_yn=0
SELECT goods.* FROM map_seller_goods inner join goods on map_seller_goods.goods_id = goods.goods_id WHERE map_seller_goods.seller_id = #{seller_id} and map_seller_goods.use_yn=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO send(seller_id, goods_id, goods_count, sell_price, recv_phone, send_phone, tr_id, userid, title, msg, status_code, result_code) VALUES(#{seller_id}, #{goods_id}, #{goods_count}, #{sell_price}, #{recv_phone}, #{send_phone}, #{tr_id}, #{userid}, #{title}, #{msg}, #{status_code}, #{result_code});
mapper.select:
SELECT send.*, seller.company_name, goods.brand_name FROM send inner join seller on send.seller_id = seller.seller_id inner join goods on send.goods_id = goods.goods_id ORDER BY created desc
LIMIT #{start_index}, #{page_size}
